I will need the one-time password (OTP) from the verification email that has been sent to your inbox in order to proceed with the refund for the previously used discount code "BLACKFRIDAY50".

Meanwhile, I've found a MacBook available for purchase:

- **Model:** Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch, M3 Pro Chip (16-core CPU, 40-core GPU)
- **Price:** $1999.99
